title: Preparation of teachers: student teachers meet two problems in understanding children
creator_credit: Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: A dramatised account of the training of teachers in USA, centred round two students studying at a laboratory school at the Ball States Teacher’s College, Indiana. The emphasis is one the need to understand children, to provide for individual pupil differences and to develop desirable personal traits in teachers.
